DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objectives : The primary objective study • investigate response ( proliferation , apoptosis ) , well reactivation p53 pathways patient treat 5-azacitadine HPV-positive HPV-negative HNSCC . Secondary Objectives The secondary objective study : - investigate response ( proliferation , apoptosis ) , well reactivation IFN pathways patient treat 5-azacitadine HPV-positive HPV-negative HNSCC . - investigate clinical activity 5-azacitadine patient HPV-positive HPV-negative HNSCC . - investigate safety 5-azacitadine patient HPV-positive HPV-negative HNSCC
DOC.criteria: 1 . Histologically confirm HNSCC surgically resectable disease 2 . Age ≥18 year age . 3 . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance Status score 0 , 1 2 4 . ANC great equal 1500 , Hb great equal 8 , platelet count great equal 100,000 1 . AST ALT great 2.5 x ULN 2 . Known brain metastasis 3 . Women must pregnant breastfeed 4 . Known allergy 5azacitadine 5 . Patients receive investigational agent within 4 week start study
